text:
Hey guys, let me show you how to make croutons.
These small cubes of fried bread are perfect

for adding a bit of crunch to your soup or
salad.
First up, use stale bread and dice it into small cubes.

Place a frying pan over
a medium heat.
Add a drizzle of olive oil. Melt one tablespoon of butter.

When the fat
is hot, add a handful of bread cubes. At that point you can add seasoning or herbs or even
garlic to the pan.
Fry them a few minutes.The croutons are ready when they reach a golden brown colour.
Set aside a kitchen paper to absorb the excess oil.

And this is how to
make croutons.
